questions.quote: I-I don't get these birds! They're breaking the deal. It-it's like the pigeons decided to ignore me!
He was a communist. Thick as they come. Like a big juicy steak.
Suzie. Call Dr. Bison. Set up an appointment for Mr. Kramer here. Tell him it's from me.
What move? *My* move. The one I told you about. You used it on Elaine.
Yeah, you're right, you're right.  Alright, maybe he's not interested, but you still know him - can't you just ask him?
That's more you than you've ever been. Hey, what is with the pink lining?
I just hope that whole pony incident didn't put a damper on the trip.

Would it kill him to check up on us? No - drops off the meals and that's it. I realize we're prisoners, but we're still entitled to catsup.
Right. So why I'm the one who gets 'reer'. You know I mean they were being as catty as I was. It's a double standard.
